name: Vatnajökull Glacier
description: Europe’s largest glacier, covering 8% of Iceland’s landmass, with stunning ice caves and volcanic landscapes.

name: Perito Moreno Glacier
description: One of the few advancing glaciers in the world, located in Los Glaciares National Park.

name: Aletsch Glacier
description: The largest glacier in the Alps, offering breathtaking mountain views.

name: Fox Glacier
description: A temperate maritime glacier descending from the Southern Alps to rainforest areas.

name: Lambert Glacier
description: The world’s largest glacier, stretching over 400 km in length.

name: Hubbard Glacier
description: One of the most active glaciers in North America, known for its massive calving events.
